jsky.navigator
Class NavigatorImageDisplayControl

java.lang.Object

                                +--jsky.navigator.NavigatorImageDisplayControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class NavigatorImageDisplayControl
extends ImageDisplayControl

Extends the ImageDisplayControl class by adding support for browsing catalogs and plotting catalog symbols on the image.

See Also:
Serialized Form
